fpuhk mYtyu; gpupTf;Fs; mike;Js;s khjk;g  fldPNuup kPd;gpb Kfhikj;Jt gpuNjrkhf ,j;jhy; gpufldk; nra;ag;gl;Ls;sJ

1. 80 - Cutj ;j
